articles.headline: A Comic Take on Wall Street by an Ex-Bear Stearns Executive
articles.snippet: Maureen Sherry has written a book about a woman’s trip through the financial crisis. A movie is planned.
articles.abstract: Maureen Sherry has written a book about a woman’s trip through the financial crisis. A movie is planned.
articles.lead_paragraph: A strong, intelligent woman struggles to break through the double-pane glass ceiling of a top investment firm on Wall Street.

articles.headline: Rival Factions of Top Donors Get Behind Marco Rubio and Ted Cruz
articles.snippet: Many Wall Street financiers have rallied behind Senator Marco Rubio, Federal Election Commission filings show, while a new counter-establishment of conservatives is backing Senator Ted Cruz.
articles.abstract: Many Wall Street financiers have rallied behind Senator Marco Rubio, Federal Election Commission filings show, while a new counter-establishment of conservatives is backing Senator Ted Cruz.
articles.lead_paragraph: The wealthy donors who have built a powerful shadow Republican Party of outside groups are rapidly cleaving into two mutually hostile and deep-pocketed factions, complicating efforts to deny the party’s nomination to Donald J. Trump, reports filed with the Federal Election Commission on Sunday showed.
articles.byline: By Nicholas Confessore and Sarah Cohen
